network_host
typedef
network_host

The network_host class is a traffic generator.  You can think network_host as a PC, it can send out IP packets to network.

--------------------------------------------
|                                          |
| send_packet()      -> network output --> | -->
|                                          |
| receive_proc()     <- network input  <-- | <--
|                                          |
--------------------------------------------
